thread.title: College Gameday Sign roundup: One thing on the brain
thread.title_full: College Gameday Sign roundup: One thing on the brain

title: College Gameday Sign roundup: One thing on the brain
text:
The real question is not frosted or unfrosted. It’s toasted or non-toasted . "Richmond eats unfrosted poptarts" is one of the best gameday signs I've ever seen. 
— Alex Smith (@Alex_SmithPHI) October 24, 2015 
This seems rude. 
— Hunker Down Hokies (@HunkerDownHokie) October 24, 2015 
Mixing in a Lil B joke with the 4th President of the United States? Well played. Signs are on point at JMU today #gamedaysigns pic.twitter.com/tOXamREJZ5 
Look at the Sports Junkies getting a little shine. Here you can see the Fade Lurch and @EBJunkies sign. God work boys @moneymetalcakes @GlassJoeJP pic.twitter.com/JK9t5lqm7n 
— Pedro Lemaitre (@DonP_14) October 24, 2015 
Samantha Ponder still has tons of fans. 
— The Ankle Assassin (@devinanthony77) October 24, 2015 
Aaaannnnd…we have a winner. Not even close. JMU is turnt as hell, and their ‘GameDay’ effort is the best of the year so far. https://t.co/fqwsfHp0KH pic.twitter.com/kIxgr1NZu2 
— SB✯Nation CFB (@SBNationCFB) October 24, 2015 Clinton Yates is a D.C. native and an online columnist. When he's not covering the city, pop culture or listening to music, he watches sports. A lot of them. sports Success! Check your inbox for details. You might also like: Please enter a valid email address Sign Up
